Title: Extends the effectiveness of provisions relating to limiting the check cashing exemption for national banks and other regulated entities
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of provisions relating to limiting the check cashing exemption for national banks and other regulated entities to August 1, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 591 of the laws of 2001, amending the banking law relating to limiting the check cashing exemption for national banks and other regulated entities, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
